data.name: Pro Wrestling Sim
data.detailed_description:
Pro Wrestling Sim is a text-based pro-wrestling booking simulator. Control a wrestling promotion, decide your roster, and create storylines, feuds and matches where the winners and losers are in your hands.

Features

Promises
Your workers will request that you make promises to them. This can be asking for a match with a worker, asking for a title shot, or even a title win. Agree to make a promise and you better deliver - you don't want to upset your top star or his friends!

Edit Database
With the Edit Database functionality, you can design, build and grow a world of your own creation, based on reality or your own imagination, and share it with friends.

data.short_description: Pro Wrestling Sim is a text-based pro-wrestling booking simulator. Control a wrestling promotion, decide your roster, and create storylines, feuds and matches where the winners and losers are in your hands.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.10
  • Processor: An Intel processor that's 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
